CustomField.description: ADO 269310 Lift and Shift PSA Prod to GTM
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populated on ALL PSA Licensed User's Contact Record for management of PSA License usages per Dept + Biz Unit. If Resource is BILLABLE, also populate 'Billable Resource Role' which is used by Staffing + Resource/Project Planner Functionality.
CustomField.label: PSA User Role
